description: Justia is pleased to announce the release of the administrative code of all 50 states via our legal portal. These regulations are free and open for all to use and will be updated quarterly. This release comes in collaboration with Public.Resource.org, Cornell University’s Legal Information Institute and FastCase. The data will also be made available for bulk download by the Internet Archive. Access the regulations here.
